archimate:Requirement.name: IR.1.2.1: Information risks associated with target environments (e.g. critical business environments, processes or applications) should be assessed using a structured and systematic information risk assessment methodology (e.g. ISF IRAM2 or ISF QIRA).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
